Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: LAV3
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A wheeled armored personnel carrier armed with a auto cannon, the LAV3 is designed to transport troops and provide fire support. High speed in all terrain and all sides armored means that it is very effective in hit and run tactics.

It has good fuel efficiency but is quite visible.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1, Passenger x8
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
